subject: JUnit question
msgSnippet: Hello, We are facing a situation at our company of having to create JUnit tests for developed code.  Maybe we should have followed a better methodology (which
messageBody:
Hello,

We are facing a situation at our company of having to
create JUnit tests for developed code. Maybe we
should have followed a better methodology (which can
be another email thread), but the situation is we have
lots of unit testing to write.

What are some ways and/or products to either try to
automate such a task or implement some best practice
at this stage?

Better yet, is JUnit automation possible or practical?

Thanks!

__________________________________________________
